content: this pullover is worked from the bottom up in pieces and seamed we recommend a smooth worsted weight yarn for seaming like everyday worsted the sleeves are worked in minikins™ chenille to create fun accent stripes sizes 3 mos 6 mos 1 2 4 6 8 10 12 yrs shown in size 4 years finished measurements chest 19¼ 21 22½ 24 25¾ 29 30½ 32 33¾ length 11½ 13¼ 13¾ 15½ 17¼ 18¾ 20½ 21¼ 22¾ materials premier parfait® chunky yarn mc 1150-01 white 2 2 2 2 3 3 4 4 5 balls premier minikins™ chenille yarn cc 2174-09 geode 2 balls all sizes needles us size 11 8 mm straight us size 10½ 6 5 mm straight or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle removable stitch markers stitch holder or waste yarn smooth white yarn for seaming gauge 10 sts x 14 row = 4 in st st with larger needle save time check your gauge skills/techniques used in pattern knit and purl stitches placing stitches on hold seaming with mattress stitch
